1528350.name: United Gamers
1528350.description:
United Gamers is in constant development for you to have training tasks for all MOBA skills. We want to help you to improve the performance and health of MOBA players through our training software.

For now, the warm-up, the last hit training both, in an analytical and more contextualized way and the cool down, are available. During the following months, we will release the training of the other necessary skills in the video game, so that you can train them all.

Our methodology will allow you to train the different skills required in MOBA, with a higher level of difficulty than the video game. In this way, when you return to it, you will experience an improvement.
1528350.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
